text:
A huge THANK YOU the 228 volunteers who signed up @KingsCRF to #clinicaltrials of @Novavax's #COVID19 #vaccine! Big thanks also to trial lead @drjamesgalloway & @KingsCRF staff for delivering this #ResearchVsCovid. 
Read about one volunteer's experience👉 https://t.co/6MUOLa8tDg https://t.co/ARpm54WjEA
